attributes.action: Reinstate 28 (AC) Sqn's Merlin Mk3 flying display for the 2007 season.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
28(AC) Sqn Merlin Mk3(Team Merlin) flying displays for 2007 have been cancelled, and should be reinstated Forthwith.

The Royal Air Force should be backing the huge recruiting and promotional ability of Team Merlin, not cutting its flying display from the public gaze.
